author: sriok
title: Very good place for a short stay
text:
I traveled Paris on business visit and booked this hotel as recommended by my host company, as it is very close to their place. spent two days here, though the room was small it was very clean and comfortable, the room heating was perfect, provides fairly fast wifi, which was my most useful facility as I need to contact many people by email.
The breakfast was average, may be not to my liking the staff were courteous and helpful
